alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Heavy Rainfall and Possible Flash Flooding... Scattered showers and thunderstorms are expected across the I-25 corridor this afternoon and into the evening hours. The risk of severe weather is low at this time, however, heavy rainfall can be expected with any shower or thunderstorm. Under the strongest storms, torrential rainfall could lead to localized flash flooding, especially for flood prone and low lying areas. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around, don`t drown.
